tool_description: Tracks the real-time status and location of return shipments using tracking numbers and carrier information.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number provided by the shipping carrier

carrier_code.description: Carrier code (UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid tracking number: Ensure the tracking number format matches the carrier's requirements and exists in their system.
Unsupported carrier: Use a supported carrier code such as UPS, FEDEX, USPS, DHL, or contact support for additional carriers.
Return ID not found: Verify the return_id exists in the system and is associated with an active return request.
usage: Provide tracking_number, carrier_code, and return_id to get current shipment status and location information.

current_status.description: Current shipment status (in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception, etc.)

current_location.description: Current location or last known location of the package

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last status update
